feed.title: Kubetail Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Kubetail: cli/v0.5.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: fix issue parsing "statefulsets" in source strings by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/274
  • new: improve source picker UI by @christianvmm in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/277
  • new: implement kubeconfig flag as global to CLI by @rxinui in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/279
  • fix: improve pin-to-bottom behavior when tailing in logging console by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/291

New Contributors

  • @christianvmm made their first contribution in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/277

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/compare/cli/v0.5.2...cli/v0.5.3

entry.title: New release for Kubetail: cli/v0.6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ğŸ£ Upgrade gqlgen and other housekeeping by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/300
  • ğŸ£ Allow dashboard to accept bearer tokens in auth-mode 'auto' by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/310
  • ğŸ£ Fix problems when cluster-api-enabled is false in Dashboard UI by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/313
  • ğŸ£ Add initial set of tests for kube-config-watcher by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/317
  • ğŸ‹ Linux packages build by @victorchrollo14 in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/308
  • ğŸ£ Handle Cluster API 'not available' in dashbard frontend by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/336
  • ğŸ£ Bugfix for flakey kube-config-watcher unit tests by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/338
  • ğŸ£ Fix logmetadata service race condition by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/339
  • fix(ci): Update pnpm/action-setup in ci.yml by @krisn2 in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/340
  • Fix workload counts in dashboard sidebar by @christianvmm in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/278
  • ğŸ£ Fix uninitialized config bug and refactor kubeconfig handling code by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/348
  • ğŸ‹ add a workflow to publish kubetail windows binary to winget repository by @victorchrollo14 in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/335
  • ğŸ‹ Add support for KUBECONFIG env var @bavarianbidi @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/348
  • ğŸ‹ Add support for multiple config files to KubeConfigWatcher by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/351

New Contributors

  • @krisn2 made their first contribution in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/340
  • @bavarianbidi made their first contribution in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/348

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/compare/cli/v0.5.3...cli/v0.6.0

entry.title: New release for Kubetail: cli/v0.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • â¬†ï¸ Upgrade Go to 1.24.3 by @misshanya in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/356
  • ğŸ£ Fix concurrent map write in DesktopHealthMonitor by @misshanya in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/361
  • ğŸ£ Add worker to cache only after successful start in DesktopHealthMonitor by @misshanya in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/364
  • Fix Make grep filter case-insensitive by @SuryaSrikar in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/365
  • ğŸ£ Fix GraphQL cache merge issue in dashboard homepage by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/370

New Contributors

  • @misshanya made their first contribution in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/356
  • @hanshal101 made their first contribution in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/359
  • @SuryaSrikar made their first contribution in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/365

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/compare/cli/v0.6.0...cli/v0.7.0

entry.title: New release for Kubetail: cli/v0.7.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add environment control widget for developers, visible only in "dev" mode by @sheimaAli in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/362
  • ğŸ£ Readability improvements to EnvironmentControl widget by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/373
  • ğŸ£ Implement and use typed version of sync map by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/381
  • ğŸ‹ feat(contextMu): replace map+mutex with SyncMap for contextMu (#395) by @siriookie in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/402
  • ğŸ£ makes newTunnel context aware by @fedmag in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/403
  • ğŸ£ feat: Add Sec-Fetch-Site validation for WebSocket connections by @ramsyana in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/406
  • â¬†ï¸ Upgrade Go dependencies by @ozancaglar in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/408
  • Bump Kubetail UI version 0.18 -> 0.20 by @Rukomoynikov in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/413
  • chore: Update pnpm to v10.12.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/427
  • ğŸ£ fix(api): prevent writing to hijacked WebSocket connections by @ramsyana in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/448

New Contributors

  • @freexploit made their first contribution in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/371
  • @sheimaAli made their first contribution in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/362
  • @siriookie made their first contribution in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/402
  • @fedmag made their first contribution in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/403
  • @ramsyana made their first contribution in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/406
  • @sanjay7178 made their first contribution in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/407
  • @ozancaglar made their first contribution in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/408
  • @Rukomoynikov made their first contribution in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/413
  • @tzabbi made their first contribution in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/400
  • @renovate made their first contribution in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/422
  • @MasanobuRyuman made their first contribution in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/416

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/compare/cli/v0.7.0...cli/v0.7.1

entry.title: New release for Kubetail: cli/v0.7.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • âœ¨ Use specific commit hash for actions from individual developers by @ansoncht in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/474
  • â™»ï¸ Split CI into 2 files to improve readability and reusability by @NickSolante in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/459
  • â™»ï¸ 2D Docker Matrix and Modular Parallelisation by @NickSolante in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/477
  • ğŸ‹ test: add transport_test by @atlomak in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/479
  • ğŸ‹ Add unit tests health monitor by @yinho999 in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/481
  • âœ¨ Update dependency lucide-react to ^0.516.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/423
  • âœ¨ Update dependency react-router-dom to v7.6.2 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/424
  • âœ¨ Update Rust crate tempfile to v3.20.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/428
  • âœ¨ Update dependency @types/node to v22.15.32 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/462
  • âœ¨ Upgrade rgkl rust dependencies by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/484
  • âœ¨ Update olegtarasov/get-tag action to v2.1.4 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/467
  • âœ¨ Update golang Docker tag to v1.24.4 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/465
  • âœ¨ Update dependency go to v1.24.4 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/463
  • âœ¨ Update dependency postcss to v8.5.6 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/464
  • ğŸ£ Fixed regression bug from previous fsnotify upgrade by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/486
  • ğŸ‹ Adding opentelemetry instrumentation to ClusterAgent by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/485
  • âœ¨ Go dep upgrades, pinned gorilla/csrf to 1.7.2 by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/490
  • âœ¨ Upgrade Dashboard UI TypeScript and ESLint to latest versions by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/500
  • âœ¨ Enable prettier, fix linting issues by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/501
  • âœ¨ Upgrade to vite 6, removed unnecessary dependencies by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/502
  • âœ¨ Upgrade dashboard-ui dependencies by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/503
  • âœ¨ Upgrade graphql-ws and tailwind-merge by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/506
  • ğŸ‹ Add dual port support to cluster-api server (HTTP + HTTPS) by @tzabbi in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/509
  • ğŸ£ Fixes Rpm build issue and deb build issue in release ci by @victorchrollo14 in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/514
  • ğŸ‹ Add a simple end to end ( e2e ) test to kubetail that runs in the ci. by @victorchrollo14 in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/405
  • ğŸ‹ Add SignPath to release workflow by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/527
  • âœ¨ Migrate from Recoil to Jotai by @ksprabhatkumar in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/530
  • âœ¨ Improve SignPath integration by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/532
  • ğŸ£ Fix shasum calculation order issue in release-cli workflo and refactor by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/533
  • âœ¨ Migrate to Tailwind v4 and React 19 by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/534
  • âœ¨ Upgrade dashboard-ui dependencies by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/539
  • âœ¨ Set SignPath policy to 'release-signing' by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/542
  • âœ¨ grpc-dispatcher-go upgrade and other improvements by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/545
  • ğŸ‹ Add mTLS support to Cluster Agent by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/546
  • ğŸ£ Switch to using SyncMap in desktop connection manager to fix slow startup times by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/547
  • âœ¨ Revert to single-port http endpoints in Dashboard and Cluster Agent by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/548
  • ğŸ£ Security fix: handle eslint-config-prettier compromise (CVE-2025-54313) by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/550
  • âœ¨ Removed renovate config and validator action, pin action versions by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/552
  • ğŸ£ Add back missing deb file location to archive uploader step in release-cli workflow by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/554
  • ğŸ£ Remove unnecessary server-side context cancellation error logging in Dashboard by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/557
  • ğŸ£ Fix concurrent memoization issue in syncmap by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/558
  • âœ¨ Fix go dependency issues and small improvement to DesktopConnectionManager by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/559
  • âœ¨ Remove unnecessary go.work.sum by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/560
  • ğŸ£ Issue warning on browser open error instead of fatal exit by @ASaidOguz in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/563
  • ğŸ£ Fix scroll timing issue in logfeed viewer by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/567
  • ğŸ£ Bugfixes and improvements to RGKL LogFileRegexMatcher by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/568
  • ğŸ‹ Removes token-based csrf protection in favor of Sec-Fetch-Site header by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/570
  • ğŸ£ Upgrade kubetail-ui dependency to fix checkmark issue by @amorey in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/571

New Contributors

  • @ansoncht made their first contribution in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/474
  • @NickSolante made their first contribution in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/459
  • @atlomak made their first contribution in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/479
  • @yinho999 made their first contribution in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/481
  • @ksprabhatkumar made their first contribution in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/530
  • @ASaidOguz made their first contribution in https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/pull/563

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kubetail-org/kubetail/compare/cli/v0.7.1...cli/v0.7.3
